entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 12.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
